holidays.title: National Maple Syrup Day
holidays.description: Maine might have its lobsters, but Vermont has its maple syrup.

holidays.title: Bhutan National Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn all you need to know about this widely celebrated holiday in Bhutan.

holidays.title: Canadian Maple Syrup Day
holidays.description: It is time to enjoy some smooth, silky, and sweet maple syrup!

holidays.title: Festival of Winter Walks
holidays.description: Join us as we explore this wondrous holiday festival this winter season!

holidays.title: National Device Appreciation Day
holidays.description: An opportunity to appreciate the devices that help us lead our lives.

holidays.title: National Wreaths Across America Day
holidays.description: “Remember fallen U.S. veterans; honor those who serve; and teach your children the value of freedom."

holidays.title: Wright Brother's Day
holidays.description: The day commemorates the first successful flights in a mechanically propelled airplane.

holidays.title: Ashley Jordyn’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ashley Jordyn got her first role in 2011 when she was cast in “The Writer.”

holidays.title: Duff Goldman’s Birthday
holidays.description: This professional pastry chef is only at the beginning of his success.

holidays.title: Ivar Ivask’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented poet, knowing how to use his words was all it took to succeed.

holidays.title: Jessi’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get to know one of K-pop’s biggest stars as she rises to world fame.

holidays.title: John Abraham’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate one of the biggest stars in Bollywood on his birthday.

holidays.title: Manny Pacquiao’s Birthday
holidays.description: We wish this legendary boxer and politician all the best in his future endeavors.

holidays.title: Manu Ríos’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a rising actor, model, and social media star whose star quality is undeniable.

holidays.title: Michael Cashman’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate Michael Cashman and his contribution to the performing arts and human rights.

holidays.title: Milla Jovovich’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no film project that’s too ambitious for this incredibly talented, versatile, and iconic actress.

holidays.title: Nat Wolff’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a multi-talented award-winning singer, songwriter, and actor, and it's just the beginning.

holidays.title: Pope Francis’s Birthday
holidays.description: His Holiness has had a full life thus far — let us delve into the details.

holidays.title: Ramriddlz’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate someone who is on his way to becoming a major force in music.
